trans-unit.source: The <c>N:System.Speech.Synthesis</c> namespace contains classes for initializing and configuring a speech synthesis engine, for creating prompts, for generating speech, for responding to events, and for modifying voice characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <c>N:System.Speech.Synthesis</c> contiene classi per l'inizializzazione e la configurazione del motore di sintesi vocale, per la creazione di richieste, per la generazione del riconoscimento vocale, per la risposta agli eventi e per la modifica delle caratteristiche della voce.

trans-unit.source: **Initialize and Configure**
trans-unit.target: **Inizializzazione e configurazione**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class provides access to the functionality of a speech synthesis engine that is installed on the host computer.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe fornisce l'accesso alle funzionalità del motore di sintesi vocale installata nel computer host.

trans-unit.source: Installed speech synthesis engines are represented by a voice, for example Microsoft Anna.
trans-unit.target: Installare la sintesi vocale motori sono rappresentati da una voce, ad esempio Microsoft Anna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance initializes to the default voice.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> istanza Inizializza per la voce predefinita.

trans-unit.source: To configure a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance to use one of the other installed voices, call the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> istanza da utilizzare tra le altre voci di installate, chiamata di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sulle voci installate, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can route the output of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to a stream, a file, the default audio device, or to a null device by using one of the methods in the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class whose name begins with "`SetOutputTo`".
trans-unit.target: È possibile indirizzare l'output del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> per un flusso, un file, il dispositivo audio predefinito, o in un dispositivo null utilizzando uno dei metodi di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe il cui nome inizia con "`SetOutputTo`".

trans-unit.source: **Create Prompts**
trans-unit.target: **Creare richieste**

trans-unit.source: Use one the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> class whose name begins with "`Append`" to build content for prompts from text, Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML), files containing text or SSML markup, or prerecorded audio files.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare uno dei metodi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> classe il cui nome inizia con "`Append`" per creare contenuto per le richieste dal testo, linguaggio di Markup sintesi vocale (SSML) i file che contengono testo o markup SSML o file audio preregistrati.

trans-unit.source: See [Constructing a Complex Prompt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [costruzione Prompt complessi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi.

trans-unit.source: **Generate Speech**
trans-unit.target: **Generare il riconoscimento vocale**

trans-unit.source: To generate speech from a string or from a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per generare il riconoscimento vocale da una stringa o da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: To generate speech from SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per generare il riconoscimento vocale dal markup SSML, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: See [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94) for a guide to SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [riferimenti al linguaggio di Markup sintesi vocale](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94) per una Guida al markup SSML.

trans-unit.source: You can guide the pronunciation of words by using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A> methods, and by adding or removing lexicons for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile guidare la pronuncia delle parole utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A> metodi e aggiungendo o rimuovendo i dizionari per un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> istanza utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: **Respond to Events**
trans-unit.target: **Rispondere agli eventi**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class includes events that inform a speech application that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> encountered a specific feature in a prompt, as reported by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs> classes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe include gli eventi che indicano un'applicazione di riconoscimento che il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ha rilevato una funzionalità specifica in un prompt dei comandi, come riportato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs> classi.

trans-unit.source: To get information about the beginning and end of the speaking of a prompt by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sull'inizio e alla fine di parlare di una richiesta per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> classi.

trans-unit.source: See [Using Speech Synthesis Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09bf41e6-b88c-4ff2-9287-e42bfd38d836) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [mediante gli eventi di sintesi vocale](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09bf41e6-b88c-4ff2-9287-e42bfd38d836) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi.

trans-unit.source: **Modify Voice Characteristics**
trans-unit.target: **Modificare le caratteristiche di vocale**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle> class and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendText%2A> methods let you modify characteristics of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> voice using <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Emphasis%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Rate%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Volume%2A> parameters.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle> classe e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartStyle%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendText%2A> metodi consentono di modificare le caratteristiche di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> voice utilizzando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Emphasis%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Rate%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Volume%2A> parametri.

trans-unit.source: To modify characteristics of a voice such as culture, age, and gender, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> class or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare le caratteristiche di una voce, ad esempio le impostazioni cultura, l'età e sesso, utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> metodi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> classe o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> metodi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe.

trans-unit.source: See [Controlling Voice Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fa3f10d-2696-4701-9735-68c59ffe4816) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [il controllo degli attributi vocali](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fa3f10d-2696-4701-9735-68c59ffe4816) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni.
